actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1199.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 39 a bill to designate certain lands in the State of Alaska as units of the National Park, National Wildlife Refuge, Wild and Scenic Rivers, and National Wilderness Preservation Systems, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 39 (Alaska lands).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 39 a bill to designate certain lands in the State of Alaska as units of the National Park, National Wildlife Refuge, Wild and Scenic Rivers, and National Wilderness Preservation Systems, and for other purposes.
